IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SUPPORT THADDEUS STEVENS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY
IRS990.MissionDesc: SUPPORT THADDEUS STEVENS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY
IRS990.Desc: SUPPORTED THADDEUS STEVENS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY IN VARIOUS WAYS THROUGH DONATIONS, FUNDING AND AWARDS.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART VI, SECTION C
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE SUPPORTING ORGANIZATION HAS ITS OWN BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND MANAGEMENT AND DOES NOT MANAGE THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC) SECTION 501(C)(3). THE FOUNDATION IS A PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION, AS OPPOSED TO A PRIVATE FOUNDATION, UNDER IRC SECTION 509(A)(3).
IMPAIRMENT OF LAND INVENTORY -181,599. CHANGE IN VALUE OF GIFT ANNUITIES 632.

RecipientTable.NonCashAssistanceDesc: VARIOUS SHOP SUPPLIES AND EQUIPMENT, SPECIAL PROJECTS, AND AWARDS
RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT THADDEUS STEVENS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE CONSISTING OF MEMBERS OF THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTOR'S CONSIDERS COST OF LIVING ADJUSTMENTS AND REVIEWS COMPARABLE SALARIES FOR EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS OF SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS BEFORE MAKING A RECOMMENDATION FOR THE ANNUAL SALARY INCREASE TO THE FULL BOARD. THE BOARD THEN DISCUSSES AND DETERMINES THE ACTUAL INCREASE.
PROFESSIONAL STAFF OF THADDEUS STEVENS COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY SOLICIT NON-CASH DONATIONS ON BEHALF OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DIRECTOR, CHAIR BOARD AND CHAIR TREASURER REVIEW 990 WITH ACCOUNTANT BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS TRANSACTIONS FOR COMPLIANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION OF THE ORGANIZATIONS EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR INCLUDES A REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY INDEPENDENT PERSONS, AND CONTEMPORANEOUS SUBSTANTIATION OF THE DELIBERATION AND DECISION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATION HAS COPIES OF THE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AND PROVIDES COPIES UPON REQUEST.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF GIFT ANNUITIES 632. IMPAIRMENT OF LAND INVENTORY -181,599.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
